General.Name: Zhongshan Broad-Ocean Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongshan Broad-Ocean Motor Co., Ltd. engages in the motor and drive control system business in China. The company offers building and household electrical motors, new energy vehicle powertrain systems, and vehicle rotating electrical appliances, as well as hydrogen fuel cell systems and its components, and other products under the Dayang Electric brand. It also exports its products to 40 countries on 5 continents. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.
